entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Greenstone (Geraldton)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:29 a.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to periods of ice pellets mixed with snow near noon. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Local blowing snow in the morning and afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
